findings.name: Missing HSTS
findings.impact: Users may downgrade to HTTP and be vulnerable to MITM
findings.remediation: Add Strict-Transport-Security with max-age>=15552000; includeSubDomains; preload

findings.name: Missing CSP
findings.impact: XSS risk without content security policy
findings.remediation: Add a restrictive CSP (default-src 'none'; img-src 'self' data:; script-src 'self'; style-src 'self'; connect-src 'self')

findings.name: Missing X-Frame-Options
findings.remediation: Add X-Frame-Options: DENY or CSP frame-ancestors 'none'

findings.name: Missing Permissions-Policy
findings.remediation: Add Permissions-Policy to restrict camera, microphone, geolocation, etc.
